attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Woolston Community High School
provides a vibrant and stimulating
environment in which to learn.
we are so proud of our school and why
we are striving to keep a High School
in Woolston.

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "Save Woolston High School."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.number10.gov.uk/Page16851


Prime Minister's Office
